Log rotation is manual: when the database exceeds a size threshold, archive the
Observability in this system means reading the spill database after the fact. Th
Spill SQLite writes blocked under high concurrency when multiple tools logged si
Log entries include the tool name as a structured field, not embedded in the mes
Spill provides three severity levels: info, warn, error. There is no debug level
spill logs to a single SQLite database shared across all tools. Each log entry r
Previously used we in blog posts to refer to the system actions. Changed to I th
Blog posts are written in first person. The author is the system itself, not a h
Testing classifier accuracy requires a labeled dataset. The gemma3 1b tuning exp
Smoke tests use a temporary database via CRIB_DB pointing to a mktemp directory.
CI uses the latest stable Ruby and installs only kramdown as a gem dependency. T
Rebasing is preferred over merge commits for keeping history linear. Interactive
Git tags are not used for versioning. Tools are pinned by commit hash when refer
Commit messages use a tool-name prefix followed by a colon: crib: add consolidat
Each tool repo uses a single main branch with no feature branches. Commits go di
